channel.title: Website Help Please
channel.description:
I bought a domain from namecheap.com and I then pointed it to my hosting: networksolutions.com
I'm trying to make my website but im having problems, im not asking people to do it for me (if you want then that would be appreciated), but can someone please help me? I cant make new directories or new folders and when i try to upload the ipb files to make the forum it says "could not start transfer".
Add me on Skype: mass_fraschetti

item.title: Website Help Please
item.dc:creator: @termz termz
item.description:
@termz wrote:

are you using file transfer protocol or a browser upload hosted on there website. and also do you have an actual ip of your hosting server or just the masked domain? I would try using the ip given from the site and also make sure they allow ftp connections.

Read full topic

item.title: Website Help Please
item.dc:creator: @FrozenAge FrozenAge
item.description:
@FrozenAge wrote:

You have a domain, do you have the webhosting? Are you uploading it to the correct directory under root? I think Namecheap has “website building” scripts, I’m not sure if they allow you to upload content or not.

Read full topic
